"The Learn with Notifications" app is a practical tool that helps users support their learning process with custom study sets. The app offers the following main features:

• Study Sets: On the first screen, users can see a list of Study Sets they prepared in Google Sheets and imported into the app. Each set contains word-meaning pairs or other content.

• Set Details: Tap on a set to open the detail screen. Here, all word-meaning pairs or content are displayed in a list.

• Learn with Notifications: When the notification feature is enabled, the app reminds you at selected intervals by showing words and their meanings.

• Text-to-Speech: Tapping any word-meaning pair will read the text aloud.

• Flexible Usage: The app can also be used for reinforcing knowledge in Q&A format, memorizing terms and definitions, matching dates with events, or preparing content according to your own learning method.

These features make your learning process more organized and integrate it into your daily routine.

You can contribute to improving the app by sharing your feedback with us!
Follow these steps to add a study set:

‚Ä¢ Go to Google Sheets and open the sheet you want to share.
 ‚Ä¢ Click File -> Share -> Publish to web.
 ‚Ä¢ Ensure the "Link" tab is selected.
 ‚Ä¢ Click on "Entire Document" and choose the sheet you want (Sheet1, Sheet2, etc.).
 ‚Ä¢ Select "Web page" and then "Comma-separated values" from the dropdown.
 ‚Ä¢ Copy the link starting with "https://docs.google.com/".
 ‚Ä¢ Return to the app and press the '+' button at the bottom.
 ‚Ä¢ Paste the copied link in the field and press "Add".
 ‚Ä¢ The format of the Study Set in Google Sheets is as follows: The first cell in the first row is the title, and subsequent rows contain word-meaning pairs in two cells.
 ‚Ä¢ That's it ‚ò∫Ô∏è Happy learning!
